com.enigmabridge.retry

Class EBRetryException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.enigmabridge.retry.EBRetryException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EBRetryAbortedException, EBRetryCancelledException, EBRetryFailedException

    public class EBRetryException
extends Exception
    Root exception for all retry based exceptions. Created by dusanklinec on 21.07.16.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • error

        protected Object error

      • getErrorCauseIfAny

        public Throwable getErrorCauseIfAny()
        Return an trhowable instance if the error object is of Throwable type. Null otherwise.
        Returns:
        Throwable or null

      • getCause

        public Throwable getCause()
        Overridden getCause that takes error object into account also. Original cause has the precedence, if null, error object is tested if is Throwable instance.
        Overrides:
        getCause in class Throwable
        Returns:
        cause or null
